content.text:
# The Man, the King, the Girl

|}}
The Man, the King, the Girl is the second studio album by American experimental rock band Deerhoof. It was released on Kill Rock Stars.
Track listing
#"Tiger Chain"
#"Polly Bee"
#"Sophie"
#"A-Town Test Site"
#"Gold on Black"
#"For Those of Us on Foot"
#"Gore in Rut"
#"Wheely Freed Speaks to the People"
#"Bendidin"
#"Itchy P-Pads"
#"The Pickup Bear"
#"The Comedian Flavorists"
#"Queen of the Mole People"
#"Kneil" (live)
#"Gore in Crown" (live)
#"Carriage" (live)
#"The Mausker" (live)
#"Gold on Black" (live)
Personnel
* Rob Fisk – guitar
* Satomi Matsuzaki – vocals
* Greg Saunier – drums
